item.title: Online privacy is so much more than having nothing to hide. Here's why
item.description: n the wake of Roe v. Wade being overturned, online privacy is on everyone’s minds. But according to privacy experts, the entire way we think about and understand what ‘privacy’ actually means… is wrong. In this new Think Again, NBC News Correspondent Andrew Stern dives deep into digital privacy what it really means, how we got to this point, how it impacts every facet of our lives, and how little of it we actually have.
